decks.notes: The key concept of this UR Aggro deck is to establish a fast board presence utilizing aggressive creatures such as Marauding Mako and Vivi Ornitier, while using powerful spells like Winternight Stories and Abrade to maintain control over the battlefield. By combining creature aggression with spell disruption, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents quickly and efficiently. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Proft's Eidetic Memory and Soulstone Sanctuary provide additional card advantage and utility, making it a versatile and well-rounded aggressive deck.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively control the board and deal damage quickly with a mix of creatures, spells, and artifacts. The deck utilizes cards like Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Fear of Missing Out to pressure opponents early on, while also having efficient removal options like Abrade and Torch the Tower. With a strong mana base and card draw from cards like Proft's Eidetic Memory, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents before they can stabilize or mount a strong defense, leading to a fast-paced and decisive victory.

This deck focuses on using low-cost spells and creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent with damage. It utilizes cards like Astrologian's Planisphere and Riverpyre Verge to quickly search for key cards, while Stormchaser's Talent and Torch the Tower help deal direct damage to the opponent's creatures and life points. The deck also includes cards like Vivi Ornitier and Ral, Crackling Wit to provide additional firepower. The key strategy is to maintain a high tempo and pressure the opponent early on to secure a fast victory.

This deck focuses on playing aggressive red and blue creatures to quickly overwhelm your opponent. With cards like Fear of Missing Out and Marauding Mako, you can deal damage quickly and efficiently. Alongside powerful creatures like Steamcore Scholar and Riverpyre Verge, you can maintain pressure on your opponent. Utilizing spells like Winternight Stories and Abrade allows you to control the board while still pushing the aggressive strategy. By consistently applying pressure and controlling the board, you can force your opponent into a corner and secure a victory.

This deck focuses on aggressive play with chocobo creatures and sidequests to build up board presence quickly. The key strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a variety of low-cost creatures and spells, utilizing the abilities of creatures like Sazh's Chocobo and Aven Interrupter to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent. The use of mana-fixing lands like Floodfarm Verge and Fabled Passage ensures smooth gameplay and allows for consistent access to all colors of mana needed for the spells in the deck.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, using a mix of creatures like Floodpits Drowner and Spyglass Siren to apply early pressure, while countering opponent's spells with cards like Spell Pierce. Cards like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Cecil, Dark Knight provide additional threats, while support cards like Gloomlake Verge and Restless Reef help with mana fixing and card draw. The deck aims to control the board and chip away at the opponent's life total quickly, making it difficult for them to stabilize.

The deck focuses on aggressive gameplay with a mix of creatures and spells that aim to quickly reduce the opponent's life total. It utilizes a combination of evasive creatures like Spyglass Siren and Floodpits Drowner to deal damage, while also disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Restless Reef and Tragic Trajectory. The inclusion of Cecil, Dark Knight and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares provides additional threats and pressure. The deck aims to control the board and tempo of the game, ultimately overwhelming the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through counterspells, board wipes, and card advantage, while slowly building up resources to outvalue the opponent. It utilizes a combination of removal spells, card draw, and powerful creatures like Marang River Regent and Elspeth, Storm Slayer to establish dominance. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan, maintain a strong defense, and eventually win through attrition or overwhelming the opponent with big threats. The key strategy is to outlast the opponent and steadily gain incremental advantages until victory is achieved.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells to deal damage directly to the opponent. The deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early in the game and maintain that pressure through powerful dragons and versatile spells. By efficiently utilizing low-cost creatures and burn spells, the deck seeks to end the game quickly before the opponent can establish a strong defense. The use of dragons and aggressive creatures like Magda, the Hoardmaster and Nova Hellkite helps to maintain a strong board presence and continue dealing damage to the opponent.

The deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with high-power creatures and then using cards like Zombify and Bitter Triumph to bring them back onto the battlefield for a powerful combo finish. By utilizing cards like Lumbering Worldwagon and Esper Origins, the deck can manipulate the graveyard to set up the perfect reanimation targets. The key strategy is to swarm the board with big threats and overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to respond.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly build up a board presence and apply early pressure on the opponent through aggressive creature plays and burn spells. The deck features efficient creatures like Marauding Mako and Steamcore Scholar, along with powerful card draw engines like Proft's Eidetic Memory and Winternight Stories. By utilizing a combination of direct damage spells like Fear of Missing Out and Torch the Tower, as well as card advantage tools like Vivi Ornitier, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize.

The deck focuses on quickly ramping up damage and overwhelming the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and powerful burn spells. By continuously applying pressure with evasive threats like Nova Hellkite and Sunspine Lynx, while also having access to removal spells like Lightning Strike and Burst Lightning, the deck aims to end the game swiftly before the opponent has a chance to stabilize. The inclusion of cards like Magda, the Hoardmaster and Maelstrom of the Spirit Dragon provide additional versatility and card advantage to keep the opponent on their toes.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and spells in the colors of red and blue (UR Aggro). It includes cards like Steamcore Scholar, Vivi Ornitier, and Marauding Mako to deal damage swiftly. The deck also utilizes cards like Fear of Missing Out and Torch the Tower to control the board and maintain pressure. With a mix of direct damage, card advantage, and efficient threats, this deck aims to end the game quickly before the opponent can stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells while also utilizing dragons for added power and control. The deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early and maintain it throughout the game, utilizing both creature damage and direct burn spells to close out the game quickly. The inclusion of cards like Magda, the Hoardmaster and Sarkhan, Dragon Ascendant provide additional synergy and power to push the aggression even further.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells in a UR (blue-red) color combination. The key strategy is to play efficient creatures like Steamcore Scholar and Marauding Mako, while also utilizing burn spells like Abrade and Torch the Tower to clear the way for damage. The deck also includes powerful cards like Profit's Eidetic Memory and Fear of Missing Out to maintain card advantage and pressure the opponent. With a mix of card draw, removal, and powerful creatures, this deck aims to win the game quickly through a combination of aggression and control.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on using aggressive creatures like Marauding Mako and Vivi Ornitier to pressure the opponent early on. The key idea is to quickly build a board presence and overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to set up their own strategy. Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Fear of Missing Out provide additional ways to generate advantage, while cards like Into the Flood Maw and Quantum Riddler help to control the board and disrupt the opponent's plans. Overall, the deck aims to win through fast, efficient aggression and disruption.
